channel.title: 30th birthday on Andy Dyer
channel.description: Recent content in 30th birthday on Andy Dyer

item.title: Thoughts on 30
item.description: As I'm staring down 30 (tomorrow at 7:01 pm Central to be exact) I should probably blog about how awful it is, but now that it's inevitable, I really don't think it's all that scary. I pretty much act like I'm six as often as I can. I've worn one of my favorite t-shirts, a He-Man ringer, for years. I just recently picked up a 'Vote Optimus 08' Transformers t-shirt, too.
